snippet: Mr. Levane was head coach of the Knicks during the 1958-59 season, leading them to a 40-32 record, a second-place finish in the N.B.A.’s Eastern Division and a playoff appearance.
abstract: Fuzzy Levane, longtime coach for the New York Knicks, dies at age 92. Photo (M)0

byline.original: By BRUCE WEBER; Ira Berkow contributed reporting

lead_paragraph: Fuzzy Levane, who as a high school and college star and as a coach and scout for the Knicks was a fixture of New York City basketball for a half-century, died on Monday in Irmo, S.C. He was 92. The cause was heart failure, his son Lawrence said.

headline.main: Fuzzy Levane, 92, Knicks Coach and Scout
